org.hps.monitoring.drivers.shifters

Class MonitoringPlotsForShifters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.monitoring.drivers.shifters.MonitoringPlotsForShifters

  • public class MonitoringPlotsForShifters
extends Driver
    Monitoring plots driver with the basic plots. Intended for use by worker shifters 7/5/21: Created...takes a lot of code from drivers in org.hps.monitoring.svt/trackrecon/ecal

        physicalChannel - : physical channel number
        Returns:
